page.title: 05 "Messages"
page.content: Who is{JAFFA? }Nobody seems to know, or if they do, and surely many must, they are not telling. During this summer of 1985, a wet and cool affair, he/she left his/her signature all over the{Orchard Park Estate. }Wherever there was surface large enough for yard high letters the spray can was in use. Not only the spatial hoardings of gymnasia walls - anywhere secluded or shut away has suffered the artists spray. The shuttered{Orchard Park {Centre,}the numerous small underpasses and most entrances to high rise blocks have little space for any more graffiti. {Happy Nude Year from the {Orchard Park Streaker}is faintly still there twenty yards along a low curtain wall eight months after January. The glaring, multi-colour writings are eyesores to most people but perhaps they are "messages", cries for help.
